name: hex-hover-converter
description: Converts decimal, hexadecimal, and binary numbers when you hover over them.

hexHoverConverter.formatString.decimal.description:
Format string for decimal values.
Any text inside <...> brackets is clickable and will replace the hovered text with the corresponding value.
You can use the following variables: {decu} for the hovered positive decimal value, {hex} for the converted hexadecimal value, and {bin} for the converted binary value.
Clear this string to omit the conversion.

hexHoverConverter.formatString.signedDec.description:
Format string for signed decimal values.
This is used only when the decimal value has a leading minus sign.
Any text inside <...> brackets is clickable and will replace the hovered text with the corresponding value.
You can use the following variables: {deci} for the hovered signed decimal value, {hex} for the converted hexadecimal value, and {bin} for the converted binary value.
Clear this string to omit the conversion.

hexHoverConverter.formatString.hexadecim.description:
Format string for hexadecimal values.
Any text inside <...> brackets is clickable and will replace the hovered text with the corresponding value.
You can use the following variables: {hex} for the hovered binary value, {decu} for the converted positive decimal value, {deci} for the converted negative decimal value (if present), and {hex} for the converted hexadecimal value.
{dec} is a special variable that displays both positive and negative decimal conversions (if present).
Clear this string to omit the conversion.

hexHoverConverter.formatString.binary.description:
Format string for binary values.
Any text inside <...> brackets is clickable and will replace the hovered text with the corresponding value.
You can use the following variables: {bin} for the hovered binary value, {decu} for the converted positive decimal value, {deci} for the converted negative decimal value (if present), and {hex} for the converted hexadecimal value.
{dec} is a special variable that displays both positive and negative decimal conversions (if present).
Clear this string to omit the conversion.

hexHoverConverter.formatString.stringSep.description: Specifies the separator used to join the format strings. Typically '\n' places each conversion string on a separate line, while ', ' displays all conversion strings on a single line.

hexHoverConverter.strict.hexRecognition.description: Recognize hexadecimal numbers only if they have a prefix (e.g. 0x or $) or suffix (e.g. h).

hexHoverConverter.strict.binRecognition.description: Recognize binary numbers only if they have a prefix (e.g. b or 0b) or suffix (e.g. b).
